website_summaries.verdict: PayAnywhere's card reader is a quick, mobile way to accept credit cards, but serious sellers should invest in more robust hardware.
cons: Modern features reserved for more-expensive devices

customer_reviews.title: Poor quality
customer_reviews.text: I dislike this product tried to sign in with my account and it kept saying it doesn’t recognize my identity. Nvr got to use it
customer_reviews.author: Stephanie

customer_reviews.title: Strange
customer_reviews.text: Would never work, bought this years ago, didn't work, still in package and collecting dust! Company it is through also required a bank account with funds in the bank already.....kind of ODD! Product didn't work anyway so didn't use it.
customer_reviews.author: Brad

customer_reviews.title: If i would be able to give a 0 STAR, i would
customer_reviews.text: poor customer service, i have not been able to make it to work after 5 attempts trying to setup the bank account. noone can help me from customer service,i called and e-mail and every time i am getting a delay or no response. I am now using SQUARE, excellent product and i got my fund transfer into my bank everyday.
customer_reviews.author: Ivy P Chan

customer_reviews.title: PayAnywhere Painful Setup (Sending it back)
customer_reviews.text: Be aware that if you have chosen to have your credit frozen to prevent Identify Theft your Payanywhere account will never get approved. If this happens the account will just stay frozen and you will have no idea why. My new account setup was frozen for 4 days without any idea why. PayAnywhere customer service is slow and they usually have you leave your phone number and they will respond withing 24 hours. So don't be in hurry if you have any setup trouble.
customer_reviews.author: c~

customer_reviews.title: Easy to use!
customer_reviews.text: Easy to use and attach to both my iphone and ipad. Allows for immediate processing of payment. The application is easy to work. Although, I'm disappointed that I could have gotten this for FREE! (via signing up with the application).
customer_reviews.author: Dr. Young

customer_reviews.title: These should be freely given by PayAnywhere...
customer_reviews.text: These should be freely given by PayAnywhere and they also tend to stop working after a while. They make enough money taking percentages of the charges.
customer_reviews.author: M. Baker

customer_reviews.title: Awesome
customer_reviews.text: Very convenient and Mobil I highly recommend is one of the best invention for this type of products if someone in small business .
customer_reviews.author: Pablo A. Rivera

customer_reviews.title: One Star
customer_reviews.text: Horrible! Would not work at all! Complete waste of money!
customer_reviews.author: Randi

customer_reviews.title: Grrrrr
customer_reviews.text: Total waste of time! The only think that was good about this profuct is that it was sent FREE when you sign up on the website! In fact, I tossed this that out a long time ago! As a small business owner, having the freedom to accept credit cards is a good thing, but actually bought the reader from Sqaure.com recently, and it works like a DREAM (as opposed to this!). One you signed up for this, the website refuses to accept your password, and it a complete waste of time. Like I said, it is FREE and, as my Mother used to say "you get what you pay for!" which, in this case, is 100% true!
customer_reviews.author: Fitness Dude

customer_reviews.title: Free on their Web site
customer_reviews.text: Bought this for my husband. It does work well. But it takes a few days before it is deposited in the bank. Also, When I went to the website to enroll they mail them out for free.
customer_reviews.author: Monica R. Padilla

customer_reviews.title: This  pay anywhere sucks!!!
customer_reviews.text: It should be called pay nowhere! First of all ,I didn't know there was a waiting period for activation because they never told me that when i initially applied. I actually found out when I attempted to use it to process credit cards and they kept being declined. After I called to find out why , they said there was a 3 business day waiting period . After that I attempted to use it again with the same results..... declined credit cards. Unfortunately I was waiting and now my return window has expired so I just wasted $10 on this piece of crap!!!! I'm going to chuck this and get the "square" reader
customer_reviews.author: Soso3

customer_reviews.title: Two Stars
customer_reviews.text: not connect the device have to be the maximum volument, but neither connects
customer_reviews.author: pablo

customer_reviews.title: Easy to use , great software
customer_reviews.text: Everything you need or expected this to be, it is and more! If looking for a quick, convenient way to accept charge cards for community/team/organization fundraisers, this is the tool you need. I can see real value in this tool for small businesses as well. Allows for tracking inventory, processing customized e-receipts.....fantastic tool!
customer_reviews.author: John M Benesch

customer_reviews.title: One Star
customer_reviews.text: Does work you charged me for something that was free and I want credit from my purchase
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: The system worked and the reader worked on consumers cards ...
customer_reviews.text: The system worked and the reader worked on consumers cards and gift cards. However I never found out where the money went. It never showed in my bank account I couldn't figure it out so I stopped using it
customer_reviews.author: Zed Johnson

customer_reviews.title: not a good item - bad instructions when asked about functionality
customer_reviews.text: I asked if this would work for any type of APP and was told yes - well it does not.
customer_reviews.author: Sean J Grigg

customer_reviews.title: works well
customer_reviews.text: works well, got it fast, fits my android devices. if the website worked better and actually filed my information i put through, id actually be using it.
customer_reviews.author: Rachel

customer_reviews.title: One Star
customer_reviews.text: It does not help me , so I can not use outside the United States
customer_reviews.author: aldo caceda

customer_reviews.title: Great
customer_reviews.text: works well, packaged properly, arrived on time and is a great buy. Pricing was very competitive and i would recommend this item.
customer_reviews.author: Lincoln Oliver

customer_reviews.title: No one is there
customer_reviews.text: When trying to install the product there were some issues. I try calling but no one answer. I finally figure it out, but decided no to use it due to the fact that there's no one you can reach if you have a problem. It was just scary....
customer_reviews.author: N3!20N

customer_reviews.title: Doesn't fit into my headphone jack with my phone's protective case on it. Quite the ordeal in order to make that sale.
customer_reviews.text: Doesn't fit into my headphone jack with my case on it. Would NOT purchase again, because of this.
customer_reviews.author: Doodleburt

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: i love my Pay Anywhere PAR_1 Mobile Card Reader its a nice one i love'it
customer_reviews.author: Tony  L.   Gonsalves

customer_reviews.title: GREAT PRODUCT
customer_reviews.text: This product will be amazing to use on the go with my new business! It is very fast and easy.
customer_reviews.author: L. Foote

customer_reviews.title: Such a great convenience!
customer_reviews.text: I received the PayAnywhere Mobile Card Reader and have yet to put it to good use, but it does seem to be a great convenience to have around when a customer wants to use their credit/debit card. On a side note to those wanting to share in this convenience, do not buy this device from Amazon, or any other retailer for that matter. You can get this for free from PayAnywhere directly.
customer_reviews.author: Schlombat

customer_reviews.title: great
customer_reviews.text: thanks for your dealing i will deal again and again with you because it was nice to deal with you.
customer_reviews.author: Salah Meemar

customer_reviews.title: DON'T GET THIS REASON WHY IS!
customer_reviews.text: If you sign up with the company they w i l l j u s t SEND YOU A FREE ONE!!!!!!!!!!!!!!
customer_reviews.author: Zach Goforth

customer_reviews.title: Must use an extension cord
customer_reviews.text: This card reader works great except for the fact that it doesn't support using it with a protective case on it. I took my case off to try it, and it would be great to be able to use, but I have to have my protective case on my phone and I am not going to go through the trouble of removing it every time I want to use it. I am disappointed that the manufacture didn't take protective cases into consideration when they engineered it. I can use it with an extension cable, but that is a pain too. In the end it is great if you don't use a protective case.
customer_reviews.author: T Anderson

customer_reviews.title: PayAnywhere Charges High Fees!
customer_reviews.text: Make sure to contact EXS at 877-865-7744 to set up your merchant account with your swiper! Not only did i get a FREE Swiper, they gave me lower rates than the 2.69% rate that PayAnywhere provides, which saves me much more $$ when processing credit cards with my swiper. Plus, there is no long term contract and i was able to get a printer that worked with my iPad and iPhone when i need to print receipts for my customers...Highly recommend you call EXS if you want a better deal...A+ Better Business Bureau rating also...
customer_reviews.author: Eric P.

customer_reviews.title: PayAnywhere is incredible!
customer_reviews.text: So I am someone who makes a bunch of different things, I often times just sell things to my friends or family members, so having PayAnywhere makes it really easy to get paid! I can bring my card reader with me, and just like that, money is in my account next day!
customer_reviews.author: Daruso

customer_reviews.title: Small business get constantly ripped off with this little scanner!
customer_reviews.text: Lose the idea buying this one...the shell company call Global Payments has a bad habit of stealing your customer's credit card payments and this little scanner will hook you into their scam.
customer_reviews.author: Debra Mraz

customer_reviews.title: One SERIOUSLY Cool Little Gadget
customer_reviews.text: I wasn't sure what to expect with this product, but I'm very impressed. For those running a home business, this is a godsend! It's very simple to set up. The device can be connected to a smart phone, tablet or laptop via the USB port. All actions are taken on the screen and the instructions are straight forward and simple. You can even create your own menu of services/products that will appear on the screen, which in essence, creates a "cash register" for you. Great gadget for those who have a need to be able to take credit card payments.
customer_reviews.author: Hippie2MARS

customer_reviews.title: DO NOT USE you will deeply regreat using this product ...
customer_reviews.text: DO NOT USE you will deeply regreat using this product, payanywhere will hold your funds, pretend to protect you and royally stress you out.
customer_reviews.author: brad brasher

customer_reviews.title: Only works with USA citizens/residents that have SSN  Doesnt say that anywhere
customer_reviews.text: So the name should be PAYUSA... Checked the whole website and nowhere indicates that unless you have a SSN you can not open an account. It should learn from PayPal and Amazon to value the international customers
customer_reviews.author: Alexander Holsteinson

customer_reviews.title: My friend's flea market sales increased dramatically.
customer_reviews.text: Flea markets are known for being cash and carry, right? Well, my friend that has operated out of flea markets for years has sizeably increased her income because of her ability to accept credit cards on the spot now. People are surprised to have the credit card option, and seem to purchase more this way. She had no technical troubles with it at all. I went with her several times to watch this for myself, and to test it out. I was really surprised that it was so easy, convenient, and increased her bottom line so much. Highly recommend.
customer_reviews.author: Elizabeth Mack

customer_reviews.title: Great service.
customer_reviews.text: No one seems to know how to help me set up this to my account . I kept attempting , but kept getting the run around , so I changed to paypal and square . Great service .
customer_reviews.author: Yvonne Chapman

customer_reviews.title: PayAnywhere DOES NOT pay anywere
customer_reviews.text: This credit card reader does not work! Customer service is terrible. Tried and tried to set up an account. They even had me send copies of my leases. Finally out of frustration I tied Square. What a difference, so easy to set up and use. Have been using square for 2 years without any problems. Then the other day PayAnywhere charged me $3.99 for not using my account that they never approved!
customer_reviews.author: rick

customer_reviews.title: I was their customer and I was disappointed. They put my account on hold with no ...
customer_reviews.text: I wouldn't advice to use a PayAnyWhere to anybody. I was their customer and I was disappointed. They put my account on hold with no explanations and I don't see any reason for that. I just switched to their competitors. There are better companies out there with equal solutions. As the matter of fact, I like even software and the device from Square much more, than from PayAnyWhere.
customer_reviews.author: Marina R.

customer_reviews.title: Do NOT use this company... Not safe.  Not reliable.
customer_reviews.text: Do not... I repeat... Do NOT use this company. The product is "iffy" at best and the customer service is the worst I have ever encountered. If you can get any at all. I have had as long as 2 hour wait times. And I have lost considerable money on transactions they have lost due to what they call "outages". Here is an actual quote from their customer service chat representative Betty Dickerson: "Unfortunately we cannot reimburse for the outage as our entire host was down during the time." DO NOT USE unless you want lose money!
customer_reviews.author: DakotaMan

customer_reviews.title: Rip Off
customer_reviews.text: Payanywhere processed two transactions for about $1000 each. They refused to give me the money. I suggested that if they don't want the business, they could return it. The will too! They will also take the 2.69% again. I will be complaining to the Federal Trade Commission and anyone else who will listen. This company is going to end up bankrupt and keeping your money.
customer_reviews.author: RickSkinner

customer_reviews.title: Very easy to use
customer_reviews.text: I have this one and one from PayPal which I actually got for free. Both of these devices can be used with either website. It's very easy to set up an account and start using right away. I have used this several times, but when I forgot this one, I used the one that I got from PayPal and was able to use that one for the same account. These are great to have for when you want to do business outside of your place of business. It's a very useful part of any business.
customer_reviews.author: D. H.

customer_reviews.title: Positively the WORST company to have do your credit card processing EVER
customer_reviews.text: Positively the WORST company to have do your credit card processing EVER! There are HUNDREDS of complaints filed with the FTC (Federal Trade Commission). The scanner is the "key" into your bank account and that will cost you more than you know!
customer_reviews.author: Jesse P.

customer_reviews.title: Do not Trust this company!
customer_reviews.text: The device works great but the company is bad. Be careful they will hold your money and make getting it released very difficult.
customer_reviews.author: ErinJ

customer_reviews.title: Good investment!
customer_reviews.text: I haven't got to try it yet, but the app was free and seems very easy to use. I'm looking forward to trying it out for my business!
customer_reviews.author: mallory

customer_reviews.title: You can get it for free!!!
customer_reviews.text: If you go on to the PayAnywhere website and register an account, they will send you this device for free!
customer_reviews.author: LaurenG

customer_reviews.title: Crazy that it doesn't work with Fire
customer_reviews.text: I just don't understand why amazon hasn't provided a solution for the fire. It is a great platform. Is it just not possible or is amazon just lazy? The pay anywhere app and reader are great and the combination of the two would be a market changer. Just a thought.
customer_reviews.author: cav

product_meta.title: PayAnywhere PAR-1 Mobile Card Reader - Retail Packaging - Black
product_meta.description: The Complete Mobile Payment Solution. Swipe with Confidence, Powered by North American Bancard processing over $12 billion annually. NAB developed PayAnywhere to be the easy, cost-effective, and secure way to process credit card payments on the go, anytime, anywhere and from anyone.
feature_bullets: Free $10 Credit Upon Activation! The Credit will be applied to your PayAnywhere account.
Simple Pricing: Accepting credit cards is affordable and simple at 2.69% per swipe. Pay only when you process with no monthly minimum requirements, no setup or cancellation fees, and no hidden fees.

Discounts, Tips, & Taxes: Offer your customers exclusive discounts by percent or dollar amount directly through the app. Allow your customers the freedom to select a tip amount. Automatically calculate tax rate based on your location with GeoTax.

Email or Paper Receipts: Email or wirelessly print customizable receipts. Receipts show items bought; applicable discounts, tips, or taxes; and your customer's signature. Or, print paper receipts via AirPrint-enabled or Star thermal printers.

Real-Time Reporting: Access detailed account activity in-app and/or on the free online merchant portal. Real-time reports display cash and credit transactions to show sales, refunds, voids; totals for the day, week, or month.

specifications.Customer Reviews: 3.4 out of 5 stars74 ratings3.4 out of 5 stars
